name: Extreme Cave Chopper
description:
Dodge falling rocks while avoiding the cave walls! Rock falls and player speed increase as you progress.

NOTE ABOUT CONTROLS:

O and X in Pico-8 are Z and X in the browser.

Inspired by the old Helicopter browser game, and made in the Pico-8 fantasy console. I developed this as a learning exercise for Pico-8. The code that generates the cave walls was slightly modified from a tutorial in the "Gamedev with Pico-8" zine.
